name: EMZOMBED
description:
EMZOMBED

You awaken on a Zombie filled island on a Dark and Stormy Night.

You have to kill ALL of the Zombies and solve the mystery of the island to return home.

* MATURE CONTENT WARNING (BLOOD & GORE) *

IMPORTANT !
You only have 1 life, so, if You die, You have to start over from the begining !

Action Shooter Gameplay experience with weapons, supplies, documents, map, inventory, and more.

Features:

Shotgun with Light
Ammo
Zombie enemies with grabbing & biting
Self-defense system
Flashlight
Document reading
Examination box
Driving with realistic maneuvering
Car Headlights
Inventory system
MAP
Enemy Dismemberment
Bloodpooling & Splatter
